sqls.sql: SELECT count(1) FROM FC_RECOMMENDATION t where t.ITEM_ID = :ITEM_ID and t.ORE_ID = :ORE_ID

insert into FC_RECOMMENDATION (ITEM_ID, ORE_ID, UNIQUE_CODE, PROD_ID, PROD_URL, PROD_NAME, PROD_PIC, MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, PRICE, PRICE_TXT, PRICE_STATUS, DESCRIPTION, UPDATE_TIME, BATCH_NO) values (:ITEM_ID, :ORE_ID, :UNIQUE_CODE, :PROD_ID, :PROD_URL, :PROD_NAME, :PROD_PIC, :MERCHANT_ID, :MERCHANT_NAME, :BRAND_ID, :BRAND_NAME, :PRICE, :PRICE_TXT, :PRICE_STATUS, :DESCRIPTION, :UPDATE_TIME, :BATCH_NO)
